/* StoreChgCostPriceHistoryMapper.getStoreCostPriceHistoryList */
SELECT tmpcuh.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tmpcuh.PROD_CD , tmp.PROD_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(tmpcuh.PROC_DT ,1 ,14) ,'YYYYMMDDhh24miss'), 'YYYY/MM/DD hh24:mi:ss') AS PROC_DT , tmpcuh.PROC_FG , tmpcuh.B_COST_UPRC , tmpcuh.A_COST_UPRC , tmpcuh.MOD_ID
FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_COST_UPRC_HIST tmpcuh , TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp , TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE 1=1
AND tmpcuh.STORE_CD IN (${storeCdQuery})
AND tmpcuh.PROC_DT BETWEEN #{startDate} || '000000' AND #{endDate} || '999999'
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} )
AND tmpcuh.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD = #{prodHqBrandCd} -- 상품브랜드 선택일때
-- 상품브랜드 전체일때 AND tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN
#{item}
AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) AND tmp.STORE_CD = tmpcuh.STORE_CD AND tmp.PROD_CD = tmpcuh.PROD_CD AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tms.STORE_CD = tmpcuh.STORE_CD ORDER BY tmpcuh.STORE_CD, tmpcuh.PROD_CD, tmpcuh.PROC_DT
